```{r}
X_n <- as.matrix(iris[, 1:4])
n <- row(X_n)
r_k <- apply(dbscan::kNNdist(X_n, k = 5), 1, max)
test <- clustertree:::getMetric_int("euclidean", list(d=4))

clustertree:::dtbRSL(X_n, r_k = r_k, alpha = sqrt(2), type=0, metric_ptr = test)
clustertree:::dt_kNN_int(X_n, k = 5, bucketSize = 2, splitRule = 5L, metric_ptr = test)
#r_k <- clustertree:::dt_kNN_int(q_x = test, k = 5, bucketSize = 1, metric_ptr = test, splitRule = 5)
```
